definitions.definition: To rest in a state of reduced consciousness.
definitions.example: You should sleep 8 hours a day.

definitions.definition: (of a spinning top or yo-yo) To spin on its axis with no other perceptible motion.
To cause (a spinning top or yo-yo) to spin on its axis with no other perceptible motion.

definitions.example: This caravan can sleep four people comfortably.

definitions.definition: To be careless, inattentive, or unconcerned; not to be vigilant; to live thoughtlessly.
To be dead; to lie in the grave.
To be, or appear to be, in repose; to be quiet; to be unemployed, unused, or unagitated; to rest; to lie dormant.
definitions.example: a question sleeps for the present; the law sleeps

definitions.definition: To wait for a period of time without performing any action.
definitions.example: After a failed connection attempt, the program sleeps for 5 seconds before trying again.

definitions.definition: To place into a state of hibernation.
The state of being asleep, or an instance of this.
Used for sleep; used to produce sleep.
